ICONex - Wallet

ICONex is ICON's Wallet supporting ICX and various cryptocurrencies.
Access wallet of ICON through Chrome extension program.

ICONex proudly brings the following features.
1. Convenient : ICONex enables you to create and manage wallets supporting ICX and various cryptocurrencies. Take pleasure in the convenient functions of managing your wallets which includes "Export of Wallet Bundles" and "Password settings for each wallet".
2. Quick transfer : You can transfer various cryptocurrencies and we plan to launch a direct exchange function based on the reserved balance of each cryptocurrencies.

Terms and Conditions: http://docs.icon.foundation/ICON-Terms-and-Conditions-en.pdf
